title: The Fed Is on the March. Can Your Bond Fund Keep Up?
sub_head: Bond investors have been pummeled this year as the central bank has tightened up. Here’s how to think about your portfolio in a period of rising interest rates.
body:
If, as nearly everyone seems to believe, the Federal Reserve raises interest rates aggressively this year to try snuffing out inflation, some bond investors will get battered. How much you will get hurt, though, depends on what you hold. And you can protect yourself with a few simple and sensible steps.
Most bond investors haven’t had to deal with steep rate increases in decades, and a generation-long bull market breeds complacency.
